name: Empty Waters
description:
For Scream Zone Game Jam X.

Survive a night alone on a raft, adrift in the middle of the ocean.  There's something on the water. Use your lantern sparingly to drive it off temporarily.

Solo dev's first game project.

Goal may be unclear: Simply survive for some time.

Whether you win or lose the game will close by itself, it is not a crash.

This first effort isn't much, but thank you for playing!

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
